TopicTitle: FAR aerodynamic model as option in stock game

Articles.Content: What if, squad talked to ferram, and FAR became integrated into the game as a new difficultly option! So whenever you start a new game, you are given the choice of easy aerodynamics (stock) or simulation aerodynamics (FAR) with when you choose far you get a popup warning saying something like, "this option is reccomended for players experienced in flight simulator games and aerodynamics, are you sure you want to pick simulator aerodynamics?" or somthimg . I think this would please everybody. Just my two cents guys

What's hard about FAR?
personally I don't find it hard at all, I find it easier as its more realistic, so I know how to fly in it. But it seems lots of people would find it difficult, I think it would be nice to have the option to turn it on or off in game

[MOD - Changed thread title for clarity]

Personally, I too prefer the way FAR handles aerodynamics, not just because of realism, but also because it makes it easier for add-on authors to develop various fairings / cargo bays / aerodynamic enclosures around the system.
IIRC, Ferr4m said FAR license wouldn't allow to integrate it in the game. Please correct me if I'm wrong.

IIRC, Ferr4m said FAR license wouldn't allow to integrate it in the game. Please correct me if I'm wrong.
If ferram4 was the sole author he could relicense however he wanted but FAR has contributors who would need to give their permission for a relicense as well. Therefore, what he says is technically correct. The license is GPL which prevents inclusion into a project licensed like KSP is.

However, the real question isn't whether FAR can be integrated based on license, it's whether Squad actually wants to.
Personally now the way stock aero being the way it is I crave FAR XD does anyone know if its coming out soon?
